overview: Monumental live document of one of the most popular German heavy metal legends of all time. Released to celebrate the bands 25th anniversary. Included are songs from all episodes of the band's journey and was recorded on May 7th in Sao Paulo's Directive Hall, Brazil. The DVD also features the documentary " A Journey To Brazil" as a bonus. Nuclear Blast. 2005.
title: Grave Digger - 25 To Live
